name: Collecting stars (kaluyahawi)
description:
Shekoli 

I wanted to make a game in the Onyota'a·ka (Oneida) language. I dedicated a good couple of years to the Twatati language program and decided to create a game based on the Seven Dancers story. So have fun collecting the stars and bringing them back to their group. I might edit the text to have english too, right now it's only in Oneida.
